title: Gears of War: Ultimate Edition Repack Poll
body: I have GoW: UE sitting on my disk for over a year now. Since the CODEX crack releases for Windows 10 exclusives, this game was never properly cracked. There is a crack from other game, which works with GoW: UE, but there is one major bug – the game doesn’t save. And it’s unlikely it will ever be fixed, since the game uses Xbox Cloud for storing save files. There is a workaround about this issue – checkpoint saves for all actual checkpoints in the game. And you can “load” any significant place in the game at any moment. So the poll question is this: should I make a repack with this workaround or wait for infinity for a proper crack to appear?
